name: BetterBook for Facebook
description:
A visual refresh of the Facebook desktop experience. Widescreen support, larger text, more focus on the content (not ads!).

Its a better look for Facebook.
additional_info:
Version History

v1.3
A release for the holidays! Lots of work has been done since last summer's release (v1.2), so it's now ready for some more feedback from you guys. Enjoy the present! More to come in January at the latest. :) 2014-12-24
v1.2
Mid-month release, bringing improvement of News Feed and Profile page designs. 2014-07-17
v1.1.1
Improvements to speed from code improvement.
v1.1.0.7
News Feed items now are displayed in a 3-column style. Also, further tweaks to page element fonts.
v1.0.4
Beginning to use Open Sans font in place of facebook's default. Also, many minor visual tweaks made. 2014-05-17
v1.0.3
Many adjustments to styling + position (size, margins/padding) of content in News Feed, Trending topics page, and other pages 2014-05-07
v1.0.2
Continued edits to positional properties (margins, padding) of left-hand navigation links so they're in proper proportion to theme's page font size 2014-05-03
v1.0.1
Minor cosmetic changes to News Feed items 2014-05-02
v1.0
Public release 2014-04-28

discussions.name: Kinda makes everything look too large
